titles.title: Paskenta Band Restoration Act
Paskenta Band Restoration Act
To restore Federal recognition to the Paskenta Band of Nomlaki Indians of California.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1867)
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Late Referral to the Subcommittee on Native American Affairs (Nov 21, 94).
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 103-801.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 447.

bill.summary: 10/3/1994--Reported to House amended. Paskenta Band Restoration Act - Extends Federal recognition and restores rights and privileges of the Paskenta Band of Nomlaki Indians of the Paskenta Rancheria of California.
